#summary Migrating to Microsoft SQL Server


= Introduction =

Microsoft SQL Server is a enterprise, commerical scale data management system. A free version is available, with up to 10 Gb storage, SQL Server Express can be downloaded from http://www.microsoft.com/express/Database. 

For the Express version, we recommend installing the "Database and Management Tools" option, which is the default on their website.


= Details =

Tagbase is currently ported to SQL Server 2008. For backward compatibility to Server 2005, contact us at `<tagbase.org@gmail.com>` for further assistance.

Download the correct files for:
  # *[http://tagbase.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/files/TagBase4_3SqlServer2008R2.zip SQL Server 2008 R2]*
  # *[http://tagbase.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/files/TagBase4_3SqlServer2008.zip SQL Server 2008 R1]*

And follow the instructions here to set up your SQL server:

 * *[http://tagbase.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/docs/QuickMgmtSqlServerTagbase.pdf Tagbase SQL Server Setup Instructions]*
